str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Prolongation from a primary verb, another form of which, matheo, is used as an alternate in certain tenses; to learn.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
